name: Hotel Manager Simulator
description:
Hotel Manager Simulator is a game where you can experience daily life of a hotel manager.

Druing the game, you will be able to have a taste of hotel manager's daily life including:
  • develop hotel 🛠
  • arrange rooms for guests 🏨
  • talk with guests 💭
  • deal with different events 📋
  • manage hotel cashflow 💰

Other features:
Some guests may have some crazy speeches or traits. The way you treat guests while talking with them may have effect on hotel status or how this game will end with. There are actually a lot to explore while interacting with NPC in the game
Besides, relaxing music and game env will provide a pleasant experience.

Welcome, to the golden age!
